data.actual_result: Multiple empty lines in a row will be displayed as only one empty line.
data.expected_result: All empty/blank lines should be displayed.
data.short_description: Several empty lines in a row are only displayed as one empty line
data.steps_to_repro: - Write any message that has the following conditions: one line with text, then at least 2 empty lines, one line with text again - Observe the result
